take_picture.button: Tap me, take a picture and upload it!
take_picture.uploading: {count, plural, =1 {Your picture is being uploaded...} other {Pictures are being uploaded...}}
take_picture.processing: {count, plural, =1 {Your picture is being processed...} other {Pictures are being processed...}}
take_picture.upload_failed: Oh snap! There was an error uploading your pictures. Please try again.
take_picture.upload_successful: {count, plural, =1 {You picture has been uploaded!} other {Pictures have been uploaded!}}
